sections.text:
You arrive in Lorecraft with the feeling that the world has already been paying attention.

Not judging—just… noticing.
sections.system: WEALTH is your profile: W E A L T H. HP is your survival meter.

sections.text:
A long hallway opens like a page that never ends.

A soft glow leaks from cracks in the floor—thin as hair, bright as warning.

You can either test the system safely… or learn it the hard way.
sections.system: Tutorial: HP changes must always be explained by the narrative.

choices.text: Touch the glowing seam (take damage on purpose).
Avoid it and move carefully (no damage).

sections.text:
The moment your finger brushes the seam, the light bites.

Pain snaps up your arm like a thrown wire.

You stagger back, heart hammering.

Good news: you’re still standing. Bad news: Lorecraft does not bluff.
sections.system: You took damage (HP -4). Open Inventory and use a Bandage to recover.

choices.text: Open Inventory and use a Bandage (+3 HP).

sections.text:
You keep your distance from the seams.

The hallway’s hum settles into a rhythm—like it’s waiting for your next decision.

Ahead, you spot a bent sign: 

“DO NOT LINGER.”

Someone scratched a second line beneath it:

“IT REMEMBERS.”

choices.text: Test Bandage clamping (use another Bandage at/near full HP).

sections.text:
A draft cuts through the corridor and snuffs the air colder.

Your Candle feels heavier in your pocket—like it wants to be used, but not yet.

A doorway ahead is half-real. It flickers between “open” and “not there.”

You can force your way through, or play it safe.
sections.system: Tutorial: Failure is expected. The demo will warn you before your first true death loop later.

choices.text: Play it safe and retreat to the hall.

sections.text:
You step into the flicker.

For half a second, the world forgets you exist.

When it remembers, it does so roughly.

You tumble out with bruised ribs and a sharp breath you have to fight to keep.
sections.system: You took damage (HP -3). Use a Bandage if you have one.

sections.text:
Lorecraft settles. Not kinder—just quieter.

You can feel the rules now:

- Choices move the story.
- Systems explain the consequences.
- HP tracks whether you get to keep choosing.

And somewhere ahead, the real tutorial begins.

End of Lorecraft test slice.

You successfully validated:
- Story-driven damage
- Inventory Use
- HP recovery + clamping

Next: first-death warning flow, clearer mechanical teaching, and more scenes.
